Only edit code need to change, don't add any not for description text. Fix bugs, optimize performance, and improve code readability. Provide explanations for complex code sections when necessary. Keep code easy to understand and to read. Every description needs to be in Chinese and English.Less bad code.Less complex code. More readable code. More efficient code.Less bugs.
